#summary How-to upgrade from previous releases
#labels Phase-Deploy

= From stable release (0.2) to trunk =
  # copy for backup needs the folder of openvolunteer previous release
  # get files from trunk by: {{{ svn checkout http://openvolunteer.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ openvolunteer}}}
  # changes settings in openvolunteer/ovsettings.py file
  # on django (&openvolunteer) database: {{{ ALTER TABLE `openvolunteer_answer` ADD `updating_vol_info` BOOL NOT NULL , ADD `updated_vol_info` BOOL NOT NULL ; }}}
  # synchronize database new models: {{{ python manage.py syncdb }}}
